name: Super Distro Horizons Vs. Galaximo's Army
name_original: Super Distro Horizons Vs. Galaximo's Army
description:
Super Distro Horizons Vs. Galaximo's Army is an arcade game developed by KITATUS STUDIOS. It came out on 01-07-2014. It was published by KITATUS STUDIOS.
Super Distro Horizons Vs. Galaximo's Army is available on PC.
